metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5206 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: Firejail before 0.9.44.4, when running on a Linux kernel before 4.8, allows context-dependent attackers to bypass a seccomp-based sandbox protection mechanism via the --allow-debuggers argument.

criterions.comment: firejail package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.44.8-1').
